belongs_to_collection.name: 「めざせ金メダル！！ 新体操物語」コレクション

original_title: めざせ金メダル！！ 新体操物語～ライバル登場～
overview: Miki works hard with coach Kazama to aim for the world championship, but suspected of doping, the judging committee sets out to investigate.
title: Aim for the gold medal! ! Rhythmic Gymnastics Story ~Rival Appears~
